channel.title: Is this the good deal?
channel.description:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Tq9MXlPColw
Jagex being Fagex, this guys demoted.

item.title: Is this the good deal?
item.dc:creator: @vManlyMan vManlyMan
item.description:
@vManlyMan wrote:

@3:12 “Welcome to Runescape”. That’s what the game is now, and until Jagex decides to do something that’s what it will be.

Read full topic

item.title: Is this the good deal?
item.dc:creator: @_Coded ..::Coded::..
item.description:
@_Coded wrote:

[quote=“ytuio9, post:11, topic:410811”][quote author=Jamie1200 link=topic=512076.msg3716514#msg3716514 date=1313677242]

So this was recorded by a mod and he got demoted for posting this?

I saw the video, it’s RuneScape. Nothing that needed to be recorded… Play the game and it’s all there.

he was demoted under the following terms “Advertising real life good for in game goods” Its a bannable offense he is lucky
Moderators are to be trusted, would you trust a mod on your game if went and stabbed you in the back?
[/quote]
What did he advertise…[/quote]

Nothing, it was jagex’s excuse

Read full topic

item.title: Is this the good deal?
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

[quote=“Jamie1200, post:7, topic:410811”][quote author=imsuperman05 link=topic=512076.msg3716518#msg3716518 date=1313677438]

I feel bad for those botters…

Why? don’t feel sorry for the botters, feel sorry for the kids who get the gold, live shit lives and have no homes.

Those botters were just trying to make sum mullah.
[/quote]
I don’t think I like you.[/quote]
Lmaooo ily2

Read full topic

item.title: Is this the good deal?
item.dc:creator: @_Coded ..::Coded::..
item.description:
@_Coded wrote:

Phaze One:

They have over a thousand player mods hired and yet they spend most of their times following each other in crowded areas saying nothing. It takes two minutes to hop to a free to play world and mute rule breakers, yet you go there and the place is absolutely spam paradise. They have fucked up majorly but I still play.

What you don’t know is that jagex puts limits on what p mods can do, they don’t allow a mod to mute 50~ish spammers in a 24 hour period, words are often cleared by groups of mods but it takes minutes for the spammers to come back.

Read full topic
